name: video-speed-changer
title: Video Speed Changer
description: Speed up or slow down video playback (0.25x to 4x)
content:
Overview

This application changes video playback speed, allowing you to create slow-motion or time-lapse effects. Built using MoviePy, it adjusts both video and audio speed automatically.

Features

  • Speed up videos (1.5x, 2x, 4x for time-lapse)
  • Slow down videos (0.5x, 0.25x for slow-motion)
  • Automatic audio pitch adjustment
  • High-quality H.264 encoding

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Speed Factor: Choose from preset values or enter custom speed (0.25x to 4x)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a speed-modified MP4 video file with the speed factor added to the filename (e.g., video_2.0x.mp4).

Use Cases

  • Creating slow-motion effects for analysis
  • Time-lapse videos from long recordings
  • Adjusting video pace for presentations
  • Creating dramatic effects in video editing
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/video_speed_changer.py" "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -s "${speedFactor}"
